paragraphs.body: This is the page where formal nominations for bureaucratship are recorded and archived. Bureaucrats are users who can add rollback, administrator and bureaucrat flags to other users, and remove rollback and administrator flags. On Avatar Wiki, all bureaucrats are also administrators.
paragraphs.text: This is the page where formal nominations for bureaucratship are recorded and archived. Bureaucrats are users who can add rollback, administrator and bureaucrat flags to other users, and remove rollback and administrator flags. On Avatar Wiki, all bureaucrats are also administrators.

paragraphs.body: There are no concrete requirements for a user to be a bureaucrat, except that the user must already be an administrator. However, bureaucrats will usually:
